name: perfect-scrollbar
description: Minimalistic but perfect custom scrollbar plugin

scripts.test: npm run format:lint && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build && SHELL=/bin/bash chokidar 'src/**/*.js' -c 'npm run format && npm run build'
